imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

kubeVersion.description: Force target Kubernetes version (using Helm capabilities if not set)

nameOverride.description: String to partially override magento.fullname template

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override magento.fullname template

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release (evaluated as a template).

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the deployment

args.description: Args to override all containers in the deployment

tag.description: Magento image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Magento image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

debug.description: Specify if debug logs should be enabled

replicaCount.description: Number of Magento Pods to run

magentoSkipInstall.description: Skip Magento installation wizard. Useful for migrations and restoring from SQL dump

magentoHost.description: Magento host to create application URLs

magentoAdminUri.description: Magento prefix to access Magento Admin

magentoDeployStaticContent.description: Deploy static content during the first deployment, to optimize page load time

magentoUseHttps.description: Use SSL to access the Magento Store. Valid values: `true`, `false`

magentoUseSecureAdmin.description: Use SSL to access the Magento Admin. Valid values: `true`, `false`

magentoSkipReindex.description: Skip Magento Indexer reindex step during the initialization. Valid values: `true`, `false`

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

type.description: Update strategy - only really applicable for deployments with RWO PVs attached

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Secret containing extra env vars (in case of sensitive data)

extraVolumes.description: Array of extra volumes to be added to the deployment (evaluated as template). Requires setting `extraVolumeMounts`

extraVolumeMounts.description: Array of extra volume mounts to be added to the container (evaluated as template). Normally used with `extraVolumes`

extraContainerPorts.description: Array of additional container ports for the Magento container

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the pod (evaluated as a template)

sidecars.description: Attach additional containers to the pod (evaluated as a template)

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: In seconds, time the given to the %%MAIN_CONTAINER_NAME%% pod needs to terminate gracefully

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment

existingSecret.description: Name of a secret with the application password

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match Ignored if `affinity` is set.

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set.

limits.description: The resources limits for the Magento container

requests.description: The requested resourcesc for the Magento container

lifecycleHooks.description: LifecycleHook to set additional configuration at startup Evaluated as a template

podLabels.description: Add additional labels to the pod (evaluated as a template)

namespaceSelector.description: magento Monitoring namespace selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the prometheus' namespace.

podSelector.description: magento Monitoring pod selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the Prometheus pods.

enabled.description: Enable network policy for Ingress Proxies

namespaceSelector.description: magento Ingress Proxy namespace selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the Ingress Proxy's namespace.

podSelector.description: magento Ingress Proxy pods selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the Ingress Proxy pods.

backendOnlyAccessibleByFrontend.description: Enable ingress rule that makes the backend (mariadb, elasticsearch) only accessible by magento's pods.

customBackendSelector.description: magento Backend selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the backend pods.

enabled.description: Enable ingress rule that makes magento only accessible from a particular origin

namespaceSelector.description: magento Namespace selector label that is allowed to access magento. This label will be used to identified the allowed namespace(s).

podSelector.description: magento Pods selector label that is allowed to access magento. This label will be used to identified the allowed pod(s).

customRules.description: magento Custom network policy ingress rule

denyConnectionsToExternal.description: Enable egress rule that denies outgoing traffic outside the cluster, except for DNS (port 53).

enabled.description: Whether to deploy a mariadb server to satisfy the applications database requirements.

tag.description: MariaDB image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: MariaDB image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

storageClass.description: MariaDB primary persistent volume storage Class

hostPath.description: Set path in case you want to use local host path volumes (not recommended in production)

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing `PersistentVolumeClaim` for MariaDB primary replicas

user.description: Existing username in the external db

existingSecret.description: Name of an existing secret resource containing the DB password

enabled.description: Whether to deploy a elasticsearch server to use as magento's search engine

tag.description: Elasticsearch image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Elasticsearch image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

enabled.description: Enable kernel settings modifier image for Elasticsearch

replicaCount.description: Desired number of Elasticsearch master-eligible nodes
Desired number of Elasticsearch coordinating-only nodes
Desired number of Elasticsearch data nodes
Desired number of Elasticsearch ingest nodes

host.description: Host of the external elasticsearch server

port.description: Port of the external elasticsearch server

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for Magento volume

accessModes.description: PVC Access Modes for Magento volume

size.description: PVC Storage Request for Magento volume

existingClaim.description: An Existing PVC name for Magento volume

hostPath.description: Host mount path for Magento volume

subPath.description: The subdirectory of the volume to mount to, useful in dev environments and one PV for multiple services

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume for WordPress data PVC

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes volume permissions in the data directory (for cases where the default k8s `runAsUser` and `fsUser` values do not work)

tag.description: Init container volume-permissions image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Init container volume-permissions image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullPolicy.description: Init container volume-permissions image pull policy

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

limits.description: The resources limits for the init container

requests.description: The requested resourcesc for the init container

clusterIP.description: Static clusterIP or None for headless services

loadBalancerIP.description: loadBalancerIP for the Magento Service (optional, cloud specific)

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

pathType.description: Default path type for the ingress resource

apiVersion.description: Override API Version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress resource

path.description: Default path for the ingress resource

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraHosts.description: The list of additional hostnames to be covered with this ingress record.

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraRules.description: The list of additional rules to be added to this ingress record. Evaluated as a template

extraTls.description: The tls configuration for additional hostnames to be covered with this ingress record.

secrets.description: If you're providing your own certificates, please use this to add the certificates as secrets

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

tag.description: Apache exporter image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Apache exporter image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

limits.description: The resources limits for the metrics container

requests.description: The requested resources for the metrics container

certificateSecret.description: Secret containing the certificate and key to add

name.description: Name of the secret containing the certificate chain

key.description: Key of the certificate chain file inside the secret

certificateLocation.description: Location in the container to store the certificate

keyLocation.description: Location in the container to store the private key

chainLocation.description: Location in the container to store the certificate chain

customCAs.description: Defines a list of secrets to import into the container trust store

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

extraEnvVars.description: Container sidecar extra environment variables (eg proxy)

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Secret containing extra env vars (in case of sensitive data)

tag.description: Container sidecar image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Container sidecar image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag
